content:
1. Vegan Jaffa Cake:
* Suitable for those following a vegan diet
* Made with natural orange flavouring
* Free from artificial colours and preservatives
1. Doughballs 180g:
* Perfect for sharing as a starter or snack
* Ready to bake in the oven for convenience
* Made with quality ingredients for an authentic taste
1. Doughballs 270g:
* Ideal for serving with pasta dishes or as a starter
* Pre-portioned for easy preparation
* Made with high-quality ingredients for an authentic taste
1. Doughballs 340g:
* Great for sharing with a larger group
* Ready to bake in the oven for convenience
* Made with quality ingredients for an authentic taste
1. Chopped Tomatoes in Tomato Juice:
* Made with Italian tomatoes for an authentic flavour
* Perfect for use in a variety of recipes, such as pasta sauces and stews
* Free from artificial colours, flavours and preservatives
1. Peeled Plum Tomatoes in Tomato Juice:
* Made with sweet, ripe Italian tomatoes
* Ready to use in a variety of recipes, such as pizza and pasta dishes
* Free from artificial colours, flavours and preservatives
1. Tomato Paste:
* Concentrated tomato flavour for adding depth to sauces and stews
* Made with quality Italian tomatoes
* Suitable for vegans
1. Vegan Mayonnaise:
* Perfect for those following a vegan diet
* Made with natural ingredients and free from preservatives
* Great for sandwiches and dressings
